Typealiases.html#/s:6Armory12AlertHandle.name: AlertHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:6Armory12AlertHandle.abstract: Convenience typealias used internally to cast UIAlertAction handlers

Protocols/ArmoryTestable.html#/s:6Armory.name: build()
Protocols/ArmoryTestable.html#/s:6Armory.abstract: Called at the end of a test’s setUp method after initializing the viewController in order to generate a new UIWindow for your test

Protocols/ArmoryTestable.html#/s:6Armory.name: harness(_:)
Protocols/ArmoryTestable.html#/s:6Armory.abstract: Creates a new UIWindow the size of the device’s UIScreen and sets the viewController as the window’s rootViewController

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP14vie.name: viewController
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP14vie.abstract: The specific type of view controller being tested

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP5afte.name: after(_:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP5afte.abstract: Convenience that waits for a given test to complete before continuing

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4pump.name: pump()
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4pump.abstract: Convenience that performs one pass through the run loop for the current thread

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP11exp.name: expectation(description:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP11exp.abstract: The result of this function is used by after to handle testing asynchronous expectations

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP19wai.name: waitForExpectations(timeout:handler:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP19wai.abstract: Used by after to wait for expectations expected to be fulfilled

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP30wai.name: waitForPresentedViewController()
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP30wai.abstract: Convenience that asserts a view controller is presented while subsequently returning it.

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP30wai.name: waitForDismissedViewController()
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP30wai.abstract: Convenience that asserts the presented view controller is dismissed

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4type.name: type(_:text:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4type.abstract: Inserts given text into the UITextField one character at a time to simulate a user typing

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9tapB.name: tapButton(withTitle:fromAlertController:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9tapB.abstract: Calls handler for UIAlertAction matching provided title in the given UIAlertController instance and dismisses alert

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4cell.name: cell(at:fromCollectionView:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4cell.abstract: Returns cell of provided type from the given UICollectionView instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP10sel.name: selectDate(_:fromDatePicker:animated:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP10sel.abstract: Calls the setDate method for the given UIDatePicker instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP13sel.name: selectSegment(atIndex:fromSegmentedControl:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP13sel.abstract: Selects the segment at the specified index from the given UISegmentedControl instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP13sel.name: selectSegment(withTitle:fromSegmentedControl:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP13sel.abstract: Selects the segment with specified title from the given UISegmentedControl instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP13sel.name: selectSegment(withImage:fromSegmentedControl:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP13sel.abstract: Selects the segment with the specified image from the given UISegmentedControl instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP5slid.name: slide(_:toNormalizedValue:animated:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP5slid.abstract: Updates the provided UISlider instance with the given normalized value

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP6togg.name: toggle(_:animated:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP6togg.abstract: Calls the setOn method of the given UISwitch instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.name: selectTab(atIndex:fromTabBar:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.abstract: Selects the tab at the specified index from the given UITabBar instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.name: selectTab(withTitle:fromTabBar:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.abstract: Selects the tab with the specified title from the given UITabBar instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.name: selectTab(withImage:fromTabBar:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.abstract: Selects the tab with the specified image from the given UITabBar instance.

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.name: selectTab(atIndex:fromTabBarController:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.abstract: Selects the tab at the specified index from the given UITabBarController instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.name: selectTab(withTitle:fromTabBarController:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.abstract: Selects the tab with the specified title from the given UITabBarController instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.name: selectTab(withImage:fromTabBarController:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP9sele.abstract: Selects the tab with the specified image from the given UITabBarController instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4cell.name: cell(at:fromTableView:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP4cell.abstract: Returns cell of provided type from the given UITableView instance

Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP16sel.name: selectCellAction(withTitle:at:in:)
Protocols/Armory.html#/s:6ArmoryAAP16sel.abstract: Calls handler for UITableViewRowAction provided at the given IndexPath

Enums/ArmoryError.html.name: ArmoryError
Enums/ArmoryError.html.abstract: Errors that can be thrown when working with Armory methods

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
